amendment.description: To strike provisions relating to the National Institutes of Health.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2926 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2926 proposed by Senator Landrieu for Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR S6869-6870; text: CR S6869) To strike provisions relating to the National Institutes of Health.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2926 proposed by Senator Landrieu for Senator Alexander.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2926 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
